## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm curious about the community surrounding Verus. What are some of the community-driven projects and resources that are being developed to support the Verus ecosystem?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus community is indeed very active and innovative. The Verus ecosystem is supported by a range of community-driven projects and resources. One example is the Verus open-source hardware wallet, which is being developed by community member jesse. This hardware wallet will provide an additional layer of security for users to store and manage their Verus assets.

Another valuable resource is the updated Insight Explorer, which allows users to search for VerusIDs and view special transactions such as VerusID creations. This tool provides greater transparency and visibility into the Verus blockchain.

The community is also producing educational content to help users understand the Verus ecosystem and its underlying technology. For example, community member Macoofer created a video explaining UTXOs (Unspent Transaction Outputs) in a beginner-friendly way. Community member Houssam created a video on how to start mining with a mobile phone, making it more accessible to a wider range of users. Additionally, community member Crypto Rich created a video summarizing the previous monthly recap.

These community-driven projects and resources are an important part of the Verus ecosystem, providing users with the tools and knowledge they need to fully utilize the Verus protocol. They also demonstrate the active and engaged community that is driving the development and adoption of Verus forward.

Would you like to know more about any of these projects or resources? Or perhaps you're interested in getting involved with the community yourself?

Verus Hardware Wallet
Community member jesse is working on a Verus open source hardware wallet. Still early days but a very useful addition to the Verus ecosystem nonetheless!
Updated Insight Explorer
With the updated Insight Explorer you can now search for VerusIDs. It also shows special transactions such as VerusID creations. Check out the updated Insight Explorer here.
Community Videos
Community member Macoofer made this educational video on UTXOs. Watch What Is a UTXO? | A Beginner’s Explainer on Transaction Outputs.
Community member Houssam made this video on how to start mining with your mobile phone. Learn how to mine on your phone here.
Community member Crypto Rich made a video from the previous Monthly Recap. In case you missed it: Have a look here.
ETH Bridge, Website Delays
Unfortunately the Ethereum Bridge and new website release have been delayed. This is not due to any fundamental issues encountered but simply a matter of time. Stay tuned for updates.
Thanks for reading. That’s it from me. Until next month!
Please subscribe to the monthly recap so you’ll get it each month in your mailbox.
